meanings.sent1: She was bedarkening the room by closing the curtains.
meanings.sent2: The storm clouds were bedarkening the sky.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat kept bedarkening the hallway by turning off the lights.
meanings.sent4: The news of the tragedy bedarkened his mood.
meanings.sent5: The shadows of the trees bedarkened the path through the forest.

meanings.sent1: As the sun set, the room began bedarkening.
meanings.sent2: The night sky was bedarkening quickly.
meanings.sent3: The magic spell caused the room to bedarken unexpectedly.
meanings.sent4: His thoughts bedarkened as he dwelled on the sad news.
meanings.sent5: The storm clouds bedarkened the once bright day.
